WHYME.TITLE: Why me
WHYME.COPY: I solve complex frontend tasks with clean code and clear structure. User-friendly, pragmatic, modern—and always quick to find practical solutions.

SKILLS.TITLE: My Skills
SKILLS.INTRO: Technologies and tools I use regularly.
SKILLS.QUESTIONS_HINT: Challenge me – I love learning new technologies.

ITEMS.title: Join
ITEMS.desc: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks with drag & drop, assign users and categories.

ITEMS.title: Pollo Loco
ITEMS.desc: Jump, run and throw game based on OOP. Help Pepe find coins and salsa to beat the crazy hen.

REFERENCES.HEADLINE: Need a team player? Here’s what my colleagues say about me.

ITEMS.name: Stefan
ITEMS.text: I got to know Daniel as a friendly and calm person. With his experience as a developer, he presented a variety of creative solutions and integrated well into the team. Collaboration was always smooth and well-coordinated.

ITEMS.name: Leonard
ITEMS.text: He is a trustworthy team player and handles time pressure well. Structured work and clean code.

ITEMS.name: Peter
ITEMS.text: Reliable and friendly. Works in a structured way and writes clear code. A clear recommendation as a colleague.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.INTRO: I am open to new opportunities and eager to contribute my skills and creativity to exciting projects. Feel free to reach out if you are looking for a motivated addition to your team.

CONTACTFORM.HEADLINE: Contact
CONTACTFORM.NAME: Your Name
